attributes.action: Bring back shirley walk in centre or a walk in centre in the genealogy hospital
attributes.background: bring shirley walk in centre back or build on in the southampton geneal hospital for the parents in the shirley area and around that way. the nearest one is  in the centre of town if not got any transport you can't get there it will also save the a and e department being used when not needed

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. While the Government is ultimately responsible for the NHS and accountable to Parliament, the day to day operational decisions - including health centre closures - are a matter for NHS England. You can contact NHS England using the details on the following website: https://www.england.nhs.uk/contact-us/
